scripts.install: concurrently "cd ./packages/rapida-physics && npm i" "cd ./packages/rapida-common && npm i" "cd ./packages/rapida && npm i"
scripts.build: (cd ./packages/rapida-common && npm run build) && (cd ./packages/rapida-physics && npm run build) && (cd ./packages/rapida && npm run build)
scripts.docs: concurrently "cd ./packages/rapida-physics && npm run docs" "cd ./packages/rapida && npm run docs"
scripts.prerelease: npm run install && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs && npm run storybook:build
scripts.storybook: concurrently "cd ./packages/rapida && npm run storybook" "cd ./packages/rapida-physics && npm run storybook"
scripts.storybook:build: concurrently "cd ./packages/rapida && npm run build-storybook" "cd ./packages/rapida-physics && npm run build-storybook"
scripts.storybook:https: concurrently "cd ./packages/rapida && npm run storybook:https" "cd ./packages/rapida-physics && npm run storybook:https"
scripts.storybook:prep-local-https: npm run storybook:local-https-generate-ca && npm run storybook:local-https-generate-crt
